item.title: How Trump’s Tariffs Short Circuited a $1.6-Billion Factory
item.description: The administration’s trade policies are causing businesses to put expansions on hold—and may scare off foreign investment as well.

item.title: Kraft Heinz and General Mills Just Made a Big Announcement. What It Means
item.description: The two major food manufacturers plan to make a significant change starting in 2027.

item.title: Trump Plans to Extend TikTok’s Deadline for a Sale. Here’s What Happens Next
item.description: The president has twice before pushed the deadline for the video-sharing app to close a sale.

item.title: Amazon’s CEO Just Gave a Master Class in How Not to Talk About AI
item.description: Corporate leaders like Andy Jassy are excited about what AI can do for their companies. Their workers are worried about what it will do to them.

item.title: Stablecoin Just Hit a Record $252 Billion Market Cap After the Senate Passed Its Crypto Bill
item.description: The cryptocurrency designed to maintain a constant value is up 22 percent so far this year.
